summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Chief - AI Chief of Staff glassmorphism UI redesign. All backend APIs remain fully functional with 100% success rate. New glassmorphism design successfully implemented with proper glass token system, background orbs, and all required data-testid elements. All frontend interactions working correctly including OAuth flow.
passed_tests: Task CRUD operations: POST /api/tasks creates task successfully
DELETE /api/tasks/{id} deletes task with correct response
GET /api/decisions returns empty array for unknown session
Landing page renders with glassmorphism styling and data-testid='landing-page'
Hero title 'Your AI Chief of Staff' displays with data-testid='hero-title'
3 background orbs (.bg-orb) rendered for visual depth
Glass CSS classes applied: 3 glass-2, 1 glass-3, 4 glass-highlight elements
Connect Google Calendar button present with data-testid='connect-calendar-btn'
Connect button has glass-btn-primary styling and is clickable
All 3 feature cards present with data-testids: feature-card-0, feature-card-1, feature-card-2
Feature cards have proper glass-2 and glass-highlight styling
Dashboard route /dashboard redirects to landing page when no session_id
Connect Google Calendar button successfully triggers OAuth flow
